top.parak.kraft.core.log.sequence

类 EntriesFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • top.parak.kraft.core.log.sequence.EntriesFile

  • public class EntriesFile
extends Object
    Log entries file.

    Structure of log entries file

    EntriesFile organizes file in lines, and each lines records the log entry kind (4 byte), the log entry index (4 byte), the log entry term (4 byte), the length of command (4 byte) and the specific command content (unfixed byte). 
     +----------+----------+----------+----------+----------------+
 |   int(4) |   int(4) |   int(4) |   int(4) |     bytes      |
 +----------+----------+----------+----------+----------------+
 |   kind   |   index  |   term   |  length  |  command bytes |
 +----------+----------+----------+----------+----------------+
 |   kind   |   index  |   term   |  length  |  command bytes |
 +----------+----------+----------+----------+----------------+
    EntriesFile has no structure like a file header, and fast access relies on EntryIndexFile.
    从以下版本开始:
    2022-04-02
    作者:
    KHighness
